attributes.action: Immediately repeal the ban on gun ownership so the people may defend themselves against the Islamic criminals you sponsor in this country.
attributes.additional_details: Because it is plainly evident that you lot have no plans to protect anybody in this country who is not an Islamic fundamentalist, a convicted criminal nor an illegal immigrant, ALL of whom you repeatedly show you hold in higher regard than us, the people of this country.

rejection.details:
Please see petition below:

Petition Title: Revoke Gun Control

Created by: Martin Callaghan

Closing: 30/03/2015
